column5: Anyone fished the Manitoba part of Lake of the Woods? - can you get muskie or bass or crappie? - or is it basically walleye and pike which are there which would be ok too - what kind of structure is there? - what kind of depth? - I know the area out of Kenora but not Manitoba - any help would be appreciated - thanks - Larry(zzlaw)

Well the Manitoba part of Lake of the Woods is not very much, basically the Buffalo Bay area is in Manitoba and a couple of bays in Shoal Lake. I know there are not many if any muskies caught in buffalo bay but the walleye fishing is good down in that area. Good luck
